title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Prediction (1 point)

· Labeled mRNA is in nucleus first and then moves to cytoplasm/ribosomes/ER (RER)

Reasoning (1 point)

· mRNA is transcribed in nucleus and then moves to cytoplasm for translation
